text: Hello everyone! I'm Vighnesh, a drummer of 8 years  and I was going through projects when I found automated music generation. I have read the resources and found it to be right my my alley. I also learnt the basics of Flux and just wrote a simple model in it. I would like to know more as to how I can start working towards contributing to this project. I would love to connect to anyone who can point me in the right direction! I'm looking forward!

text: some more context: I have worked on different RNNs and Transformers before. So I do have that background, but I'd like to know where I can start pre-preparing to contribute to this project.
